scripts.release: python3 css-compatibility.py css/index.css src/index.css && gulp css && gulp html && mv dist/index.html ./index.html && webpack --mode=production --progress
scripts.debug: python3 css-compatibility.py css/index.css src/index.css && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html && webpack --mode=development --progress
scripts.html: python3 css-compatibility.py css/index.css src/index.css && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html
